CoopBoardGame:BGAttackPotion.NAME: Attack Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: The next Attack you play this turn is played twice.

CoopBoardGame:BGCunningPotion.NAME: Cunning Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: 1 [CoopBoardGame:HitIcon] 1 [CoopBoardGame:HitIcon] 1 [CoopBoardGame:HitIcon] NL Treat each [CoopBoardGame:HitIcon] as a separate 0 cost Attack.

CoopBoardGame:BGDistilledChaos.NAME: Distilled Chaos
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b3 cards. NL Immediately play them in any order for 0 Energy.

CoopBoardGame:BGElixirPotion.NAME: Purity Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: #yExhaust up to #b3 cards in your hand.

CoopBoardGame:BGFairyPotion.NAME: Fairy in a Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, heal to #b2 HP instead and discard this potion.

CoopBoardGame:BGFearPotion.NAME: Fear Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal 2x damage on each [CoopBoardGame:HitIcon] in the next Attack, then remove a [CoopBoardGame:VulnIcon] token.

CoopBoardGame:BGFlexPotion.NAME: Flex Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [CoopBoardGame:StrIcon] . Lose [CoopBoardGame:StrIcon] at end of turn.

CoopBoardGame:BGGamblersBrew.NAME: Gambler's Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: Change the die to any number (before accepting the roll).

CoopBoardGame:BGGhostInAJar.NAME: Ghost in a Jar
DESCRIPTIONS: You can't lose more than #b1 HP this turn.

CoopBoardGame:BGSkillPotion.NAME: Skill Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: The next Skill you play this turn is played twice.
